title: Hyderbad NCLT rejects Viceroy Hotels plan, directs RP to restart sale process
description: In an order dated June 9. the division bench of the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) directed the resolution professional Viceroy Hotels to restart the sale process and complete is within 60 days of the order.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
